programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep23
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep38
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Untuk Apa Aku Dinikahi, Kalau Hanya Disakiti?
programme.desc: Nana akan bersalin tidak lama lagi. Semasa dalam perjalanan ditemani suaminya, mereka mengalami kemalangan. Malangnya, suaminya meninggal dunia.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Go Go 70S
programme.desc: In Korea, the 1970s were a time of military dictatorship and pop culture revolution. Sang-Kyu plans to do one last concert before more clubs close down due to military oppression.

programme.title: The Foul King
programme.desc: A timid bank clerk discovers his talent as a wrestler by ways of cheating that no one had thought of. Yet frustrated to win solely by tricks, he decided to master moves in becoming a real wrestler.

programme.title: Voice Of Silence
programme.desc: Two guys make a living by cleaning up crime scenes were asked to take care of a kidnapped girl by their superior. As their superior were killed, the duo are clueless on what to do with the girl...

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 1. The Subversion

programme.desc: Jing Bo Ran and Wang Kai lead the team members, Jam Hsiao, Jackson Wang, Yang Shuo and Bai Jing Ting, to work together to complete various difficult task challenges, such as the high-altitude adventures, room escape games, and the cross country activities.

programme.title: Relation Ship Ep11
programme.desc: A romance variety show which six strangers travel together on a cruise exchanging signals of love and growing emotions . Stars such as Meng Fei, Huang Wei, Zhang Chun-yi, Guo Jing-fei, Zhu Zheng-ting, and Cheng Xiao will form an observation group to discuss and analyze the relationship of the potential lovers.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2018) Ep44
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: Athletes and Stars Season 2 Ep9
programme.desc: The reality show gathered over 20 top sports champions and artists including Chun Wu, Fan Zhiyi, Meng Hetang and Han Tianyu. They divided into two teams to have 12 different sports competitions. They strive for the champion and hopefully compete for the glory of “Champion Team". "

programme.title: An Exciting Offer Season 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Focusing on the construction industry, this show records the stories of several architecture students with architecture dreams who enter two different construction companies, a large design institute and a small office, and compete for their exciting offers through a one-month internship.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3355
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45384539
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep893894
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1776
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45384539
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1776
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3534
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep895896
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1982
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Like That Also Can (M) Ep4
programme.desc:
We are " Jiangplay " challenge, we are " Jiangplay " experience, understanding life and fun! So, get out of your comfort zone, break through your echo chamber!
“Jiangplay” is an all new social media and reality show that our hosts experience, take on challenges by gathering trendie, old school, hippie and sub-cultures, creating unexpected fun and an all new impression on learning, giving you resonating inspiration and rush in each episode.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company with all women staff. As he is clueless with women, he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join and help him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love, Mona.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack…

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nation’s Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong’s biggest stars

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Kung Fu Jungle
programme.desc: A vicious killer goes around challenging and killing top refined martial arts masters. When convicted killer and kung fu expert Hahou Mo hears of this, he offers to help the police capture the killer in exchange for his freedom. Can he really help?

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: A murder case which the bullet seems to disappear. A detective and his partner start the investigation that revolves around the questions of “Is shooting without bullets possible? How can a bullet disappear upon contact with a body?”

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: In Swift Sword, popular director Ho Meng-hua exposes a whole cast of established talent to create a searing martial arts extravaganza that reeks of steel-slashing bewitchment worthy of any swordplay epic.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them…

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandma’s pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chief’s daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu-hsin (Pai Piao) of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman (Wang Jung) to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker (Ku Feng). When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh (Derek Yee) vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: A heroic family is double crossed and massacred on the battle field with only two of the brothers surviving the slaughter. One of the brothers (Gordon Liu), escapes to a Shaolin temple where his bloodlust and thirst for vengeance puts him at odds with the monks. When he discovers his sister is captured by the same villains who destroyed his family he leaves the monastery in an attempt to rescue her and avenge what has come upon his family.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries the young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this “young” auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world. However, she is caught between both men whom she admires when facing a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Cha’s “The Book and the Sword”. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professor’s assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family’s objection, so Hong’s maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Trilogy Of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: A kung fu anthology film consisting of three stories: a man embarrasses himself while trying to prove his worth to the father of the woman he loves; a courtesan in love with a general will need to deliver a notorious bandit in exchange for him not being executed; and a group of bandits forms a plan to rescue a new friend from being executed.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: The Emperor And His Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong’s younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles…

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies…

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: In The Sword And The Lute, Kwei Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) and his partner (Chin Ping) are on a mission to destroy the "Phoenix Lute", a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles up to 500 paces and which can only be destroyed by the Kan curved sword...

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police’s son, blames his father for his mother’s death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Pursuit Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Martial Arts Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers’ death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Lady Is The Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Saleem
programme.desc: When Satya is kidnapped, Munna rescues her and they both fall in love with each other. However, things take a turn when she elopes with someone else.

programme.title: Kaadan
programme.desc: Kaadan is a true-blue animal film signifying a deep and strong bond between humans and animals.

programme.title: Anandam Vilayadum Veedu
programme.desc: While Muthupandi and Kaasi, two half-brothers, lead harmonious lives with their large families, their formidable unity is threatened by the evil scheme of an old nemesis.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Ignoring her misgivings, a young woman purchases a vintage car, which seems to have a mind of its own. Further investigation reveals that it is possessed by a vengeful spirit with ties to her past.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a skull is found in a package, ACP Sathyajith gets tasked with identifying the victim and finding the killer. Parallelly, a journalist, who gets haunted by a spirit, investigates the mystery.

programme.title: Dhuruvangal 16
programme.desc: A couple dies under mysterious circumstances and Inspector Deepak is assigned the case. However, he loses his leg in a confrontation during the investigation, which leads to the end of his career.

programme.title: Mirch Masala
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Sillu Karupatti
programme.desc: An anthology of four romantic stories revolving around people of different age groups where the only true thing binding them all together is love.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Following an accident, a young man gets a major surgery performed on his face. However, when he realises that a lot of people are after his life, he decides to find out why.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Velan
programme.desc: A carefree Velan falls in love with his collegemate, Ananya, and plans to marry her. However, a mistake in the decision made by his father, an influential man, puts the couple's romance in jeopardy.

programme.title: En Peyar Surya En Veedu India
programme.desc: Following two violent incidents at a club and a police station, a short tempered soldier is challenged to give up anger if he wants to fulfill his dream of serving at the borders.
Dr.Vaseegaran is forced to reassemble Chitti in order to stop a deadly winged monster.

programme.title: Ivan Thanthiran
programme.desc: Two engineering dropouts stumble upon the activities of a corrupt education minister owning engineering colleges and expose him. The minister wants revenge and launches a manhunt for them. The cat-and-mouse game begins.

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: In a bid to escape from Viji's antics, his neighbours lure him to fall in love with Maya. However, everything turns upside down when he realises that a ghost is protecting Maya.

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Seeru
programme.desc: A guy from a small-town takes on a ruthless criminal lawyer for his friend and sister

programme.title: Killadi Marumagan
programme.desc: The son of an egoistic businessman falls in love with an egoistic girl and has to convince her egoistic mother in order to marry her.

programme.title: Kanni Raasi
programme.desc: Gemini, a young man, is averse to love and relationships. However, when Anjali, a teacher, moves in next door, she falls for him and tries to change his mind.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A TV journalist goes against the orders of his corrupt and dishonest boss and helps a group of youngsters in their fight against a pesticide factory.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 8
programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 1
programme.desc: At the port of Los Angeles, Uzi and Shlomi are out to destroy the competition. First, Uzi drives prices through the roof, causing complete chaos on the auction floor. Then, Shlomi plays a hunch on a mysterious container from China that has everyonein a tizzy. Will their strategy pay off?

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 6
programme.desc: Veronica investigates possible fraud at school in the election of student council president after Duncan wins, defeating a more popular but less affluent student who promised to eliminate the wealthy students' on-campus perquisites. Meanwhile, Logan causes a public relations nightmare for his movie star parents Aaron and Lynn Echolls (recurring guest stars and real-life couple HARRY HAMLIN - "L.A. Law" and LISA RINNA - "Melrose Place") when footage of him organizing boxing matches between homeless men is posted on the Internet and leaked to the media. Later, Veronica and Keith learn that the man who admitted to murdering Lilly is set to be executed, but a second look at crime scene photographs puts his confession in question.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep185
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep24
programme.desc: See billions of Sixlets candies, or the 40,000 heads of cabbage to make 400,000 Zarky's cabbage rolls. Plus American Farmer sweet and salty popcorn is popped, and TGI Friday and Indenture Foods potato skins chips look deli fresh.

programme.title: Wild Thailand S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Tropical South - Southern Thailand is known for its spectacular natural beauty and wild parties, but behind the familiar tourist trails it's also a place where spirituality permeates every part of life.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arriving late at night in bustling downtown Seoul, Alexander kicks off his epic Korean adventure in Gangnam, the fabled district immortalised by Psy's Gangnam Style video - the most viewed song on YouTube.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ancestors - Michael Wood joins the Qin family reunion, when 300 relatives gather to worship their ancestors on Tomb Sweeping Day, before visiting some excavations at Erlitou.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Since 1939, more than eight billion Shreddies have been made; watch how it's done. See how a batch of Black Forest cakes take 12,000 cherries to make, and how tzatziki is made by the tanker full.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Watch how lasagne is assembled by both man and machine, and see how one batch of brownies makes 6,500 treats. And you can find out about the secret spice blend for maple caramelized onions.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Shangri La - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In early May China enters a new solar term "Start of Summer". In Guizhou, scientists working on the FAST telescope are discovering new pulsars frequently.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep1
programme.desc: On icebreaker ship Polarstern, the team battle cracking ice, hungry polar bears, violent storms and 24-hour darkness, as they struggle to establish their research base deep inside the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep3

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep3

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep4
programme.desc: See an organic spin on the classic cheese twist, or millions of bite-size mint chocolate patties. Plus, how 200 litres of vodka a month puts the zing in a special pasta sauce.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Ming - Michael Wood recounts the tale of one of China's most famous dynasties beginning with the amazing story of Hongwu, a peasant rebel who founded one of greatest eras in Chinese history.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Discover how engineers bent two Manhattan skyscrapers and then connected them with a sky bridge 700 feet in the air, and in Greece the 10,000 square foot canopy designed to withstand hurricane winds on a building engineered to survive earthquakes.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep5

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Powers Ep2
programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 - Brothers in Arms Ep2
programme.desc: The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.desc: ION Adventure Hotel, Iceland - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit ION Adventure Hotel in Iceland, a design hotel levitating out from a dormant volcano. programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mountain Mayhem / Gator Spinner Max - After winning a citizen swap contest, Archibald moves to a mountain town for a week. Archibald finds a practical use for his pal's wacky invention.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep6
programme.desc: Cereal / Tiny Danger - The Harvey street kids set out to solve the mystery of who stole their one of a kind cereal! Lotta fights back when Tiny is told that he’s too small to race in a bike race.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mountain Mayhem / Gator Spinner Max - After winning a citizen swap contest, Archibald moves to a mountain town for a week. Archibald finds a practical use for his pal's wacky invention.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep6
programme.desc: Kung Boov / Werewolves Of Chicago - Tip teaches Oh her version of kung fu so he can stand up to a bully/Oh finds a real wolf to teach him how to become a werewolf for Halloween.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria Falls & Winters - When the watering hole at a Zimbabwean animal park dries up, Whitebeard sends the Wanderers to the scene with a rain-producing Weather Key; but when Odlulu gets a hold of the key, the Wanderers must pursue her through rain, fog, and snow to save those animals.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Rocky'S In A Hole Lotta Trouble/The Great Invisi-Barrier - When Rocksy sinks to the bottom of a giant pond, her friends must figure out how to rescue her... without Rocksy's help. / When an invisible force-a-wall (a pane of glass) descends upon the yard and separates the Mighty Ones, Rocksy must figure out how to penetrate it so the group can be re-united.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Squishy Predicament Of Stanley Peet’S Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep6
programme.desc: The Dark Side Of The Moose: Chapter One - When Rocky and Bullwinkle want an interesting story to tell at their upcoming reunion, they accidentally take off for space in a very real rocket

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep6
programme.desc: Gone Gustav Gone - When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep6
programme.desc: Fall Of The Castle Of Lions - When a Galra Commander infiltrates the castle and destroys its power crystal, the team must protect Voltron from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Silent Parrot - The Pirate Captain is very worried. Scurvy the parrot isn't saying a word. Without him navigating they won't be able to go treasure hunting anymore! Why is Scurvy so quiet? Is there something wrong? Or is he hiding something? It's up to Noddy to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Two Parties - The Naughticorns are having a party and naturally they want everyone to come. Trouble is, so are the Pirates. But when no one turns up to either party, Noddy investigates: Why has no one come to either party?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep29
programme.desc: Hide And Toot - The animals are playing hide and seek. Huffty gets upset when his trunk keeps giving him away. Can Raa Raa and his friends show the little elephant that his trunk is really rather wonderful?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep31
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Can - All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play… will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep32
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Whistle Worries - Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle… until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep29
programme.desc: Homesick Tin Top - Tin Top just can't master corners no matter how hard he tries. The other cars try to help him to no avail… until Roary hits on a brilliant plan.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep30
programme.desc: Save Our Tree - Mr Carburettor is planning on cutting down Flash's tree. What can be done to save the poor rabbit's home?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep31
programme.desc: New Juice - Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce. What or who could be at fault?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep32
programme.desc: Fb For Football - The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep15
programme.desc: 2500 Candles For Ra / It'S A Mad Mad Mad Underworld - 2500 Candles for Ra Upset that no one remembered his birthday, Ra goes to hang out with the mummies at the Deedstown museum. It's a Mad, Mad, Mad Underworld When Casper finds Cappy's old treasure map, he promises to help the pirate find his lost fortune.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep16
programme.desc: Curse Of The Sandwich / A Real Little Monster - Curse of the Sandwich After Ra accidentally bites into Thatch's sandwich, he becomes convinced that he's turning into a vampire. Real Little Monster When Norman the bully comes after Jimmy, Casper helps his human friend hide in the one place he knows Norman won't look—Scare School.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Dino-Can-Do / Big Bad Bug - Crackridge's new resident dinosaur has a hard time fitting in. Archibald and a new friend attempt to conquer their fear of the basement.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Costly Conundrum Of The Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep7
programme.desc: Reign Of Fireworms - Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7
programme.desc: Desert - Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garby's parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Camping Chaos - Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King'S Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Olivia Ep13
programme.desc: Olivia And Grandma'S Visit - Grandma is coming to visit, and Olivia couldn't be more excited. She's less excited, however, about having to give up her bedroom and bunk with Ian. But when Grandma invites Olivia to share her room for a sleepover, Olivia finds out that rooming with her snoring grandmother isn't as much fun as she thought!

programme.title: Olivia Ep14
programme.desc: Olivia Is Invited To Dinner - Olivia is thrilled to be invited to Francine's for dinner, until she learns that she must reciprocate with an invitation. She worries that Francine will be unimpressed by her family's casual table manners. But after dinner at Francine's proves not to be much fun, Olivia appreciates her own lively family dinners.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep13
programme.desc: Marsha Wonderful Life - Marsha overhears the others saying she is too bossy. She decides that Silver hatch would be a better place without her. Chaos swiftly ensues, can Marsha be persuaded to stay, they can't cope without her!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep14
programme.desc: Let'S Hear It For Big Chris - Big Chris is working on Loada while the others plan a surprise evening for him for being the longest serving member of Silver hatch

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep33
programme.desc: The Case Of The Messed-Up Painting - Queen Sparklewings has done a beautiful painting to use in her Story-Time afternoon. But then Coco and Noddy discover it ruined! Coco thinks that Bling must have done it but she protests her innocence. Noddy investigates: who messed up the Queen's painting - and can he get it fixed again in time? Keep investigating, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep34
programme.desc: The Case Of The Deltoid'S Challenge - "Deltoid accepts the Ninja's challenge to run around the loop-theloop. But when he fails on his first attempt, he feels ready to give up in despair. Noddy investigates: How can he help Deltoid do his challenge?"

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep35
programme.desc: The Case Of The Knights On Patrol - The Knights set off on their patrol but are delayed by someone playing tricks on them. Noddy investigates: who's playing tricks on the Knights? He soon finds them in Fable Forest, waylaid by yet another cheeky trick. Noddy will have to find the culprit before the Knights end up in serious trouble!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep36
programme.desc: The Case Of The Delayed Repairs - The railway tracks are being repaired all over Toyland by the Builders, so Farmer Tom, Tractor and a trailer are running a replacement service. But the repairs take longer than expected when the Builders' tools go missing. Noddy investigates, and finds that Cloppycorn loved the trailer rides so much that he hid the biolders' tools in a basket that Pat-Pat had asked him to take to the other Naughticorns. Cloppycorn apologies, the tracks are swiftly repaired, and Cloppycorn happily rides around the farm on the trailer. Well done Noddy !

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep34
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Wriggly Jiggly Game - Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save Rocket Ryder - The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep142
programme.desc: The Vegetable Pie - Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rubble-Double / Pups Save a Clown - Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Crystal catastrophe / Good Steel bad Steel - Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef - Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington And The Missing Tickets - Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep617
programme.desc: The Snow Spectacular - Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island/The Lost Girl in a Canoe - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep603
programme.desc: A Giant Harvest Day! - Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil, on a mission to save the town's Harvest Day (Thanksgiving) feast, must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The SS Friendship! - Captain Deemo (Deema) and First Mate Gil pilot their steampunk sub to different ocean habitats so they can deliver Friendship Day Bubblegrams to all their friends. But along the way, they find themselves being chased by a Kraken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep147
programme.desc: Super Hero Teacher - Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep148
programme.desc: An Endless Story - Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Race to Eagle Rock - Blaze brings all of his monster truck pals to VelocityVille for a wild race to the top of Eagle Rock! But Crusher will stop at nothing to beat race car Blaze and friends, setting traps to slow them down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Meteor Mayhem / Dance Of Destruction - A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder! // A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Winter Sports Chompetition! - Gil and Bubble Puppy are competing in the Winter Sports Chompetition--a competition for athletes and their dogs! Will they be able to stop reigning champs Coldsnap and his dog Mr. Husky from cheating to win the gold?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Sage and Ginger's Baby Book - Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island/The Lost Girl in a Canoe - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save Rocket Ryder - The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep155

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: The Doppelganger - By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep616

programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore.
